scripts.update: npm run clean && npm run download && npm run generate && npm run build
scripts.clean:svg: set -eu; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do npx @material-design-icons/scripts delete svg --symbols --in svg/$w; done
scripts.download: npm run download:svg && npm run download:metadata && npm run copy:metadata
scripts.generate: npm run generate:types && npm run copy:types
scripts.copy:types: set -eu; for w in 100 200 300 400 500 600 700; do cp material-symbols/index.d.ts font/$w; done
scripts.version: npm version -w material-symbols -w svg/100 -w svg/200 -w svg/300 -w svg/400 -w svg/500 -w svg/600 -w svg/700 -w metadata
scripts.postversion: npm install && VERSION=$(node -p "require('./material-symbols/package.json').version") npm run git-commit-tag
scripts.publish: npm publish -w material-symbols -w svg/100 -w svg/200 -w svg/300 -w svg/400 -w svg/500 -w svg/600 -w svg/700 -w metadata
